thread.title: Barclays to up dividend despite 2017 disappointment

title: Barclays to up dividend despite 2017 disappointment
text:
Barclays to up dividend despite 2017 disappointment 8:11am EST - 01:34 
Barclays has reported a below-forecast 10 percent rise in its annual profit for 2017, and pledged to restore its full dividend with a payout of 6.5 pence per share in 2018. David Pollard reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Barclays has reported a below-forecast 10 percent rise in its annual profit for 2017, and pledged to restore its full dividend with a payout of 6.5 pence per share in 2018. David Pollard reports.
